title: Executive Assistant
job_overview:
READ THIS FIRST


[SHORT INTRO OF OUR COMPANY]

We are a Singapore based company.

Our main core business involves coaching and training a new generation of financial advisors to reach out to more people, transform more lives and build the business of their dreams.

We have coached more than 3000 Financial Advisors and have more than 8 years under our belt in doing so.

Our clients are mainly in Singapore, Malaysia and Hong Kong and we are on track to reaching out to more of them as we speak.

Right now, We are looking for an Executive Assistant to be part of our company, and to be working directly with the Chief Executive Officer (CEO).

As the Executive Assistant of our company, you will be responsible for coordinating, planning events, communicating to the team and clients, and organising all the backend logistics and operations of the company.

More importantly, your main objective is to buy back time for the CEO.

Your position will play an important and crucial role in the team’s success.


[HOW LIFE IS GONNA LOOK LIKE FOR YOU]

You will be involved in the day to day communications and supporting the CEO directly, assisting in random tasks or any tasks that the CEO requires.


There is no limit to duties an executive assistant can handle, which is why if you are taking on this role, you must have a confident, problem-solving-can-do attitude.

We will not sugarcoat anything but here’s how it is like as well.

You WILL be in a high pressure environment that will force you to step up and grow as an individual.

There will be no bullshit beautiful lies, but rather ugly truth - although necessary - but ugly all the same that will poise you for growth.

While it might be intense, the rewards are great.

Bonuses, employee benefits and perks that will ensure you get well remunerated for your efforts.

The “work hard, play hard and work even harder mantra” is here.

Because we are going to be poised for crazy growth and expansion, you will have to put on your thinking cap, initiative and out of your comfort zone to get things done.


You'll get to attend world-class business, marketing and personal development programs for FREE and rub elbows with renowned Asian entrepreneurs and Financial Advisors.

You’ll be working with an international team, and you’ll even get to hang out with them at least once a year at our annual retreat in an exotic location.
